channel.title: Comments on: Issue 045 Author Interview: Catherine George and “A Test of Trouble”
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Author interview up on Luna Station Quarterly website – CATHERINE GEORGE
item.dc:creator: Author interview up on Luna Station Quarterly website – CATHERINE GEORGE
item.description: […] interview I did about my story “A Test of Trouble” is up today on the Luna Station Quarterly website, talking about, among other things, the difficulties of writing time travel […]
